div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1512 Baalbek (anc. Heliopolis), Coelesyria, 1885 Burial: c. 315 B.C. (Schwabacher); c. 305 (T) Contents: 22+ AR Alexander III: 21 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 9, Citium 1, Ara- dus 2, Byblus 2, Babylon 7) Philip III: 1 tetradr. (Babylon) Disposition: Stockholm Schwabacher, NNA 1963, pp. 5-12, illus.
